content.prompt:
Before listening to the entire excerpt for the first time, please read the question.

 

After a repeat of the opening horn fanfare, the horn plays

choices.label: a diminution of the opening piano melody
an inversion of the opening piano melody
a repetition of the opening piano melody
an augmentation of the opening piano melody

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in performed music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
